- [ Core Audio ](/documentation/coreaudio)

-  AudioConvertHostTimeToNanos(_:) 

Function# AudioConvertHostTimeToNanos(_:)

iOS 2.0+iPadOS 2.0+Mac Catalyst 13.1+macOS 10.0+

```
func AudioConvertHostTimeToNanos(_ inHostTime: UInt64) -> UInt64
```

## [ Parameters ](/documentation/coreaudio/audioconverthosttimetonanos(_:)#parameters)

`inHostTime`A UInt64 containing the host time to convert.

## [Return Value](/documentation/coreaudio/audioconverthosttimetonanos(_:)#return-value)

A UInt64 containining the converted host time.

## [Discussion](/documentation/coreaudio/audioconverthosttimetonanos(_:)#discussion)

Convert the given host time into a time in nanoseconds.
